title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy-Based Program for Enhancing Mathematics Instructional Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of elementary school mathematics curriculum and basic teaching-learning theories
context.additional_context: A corporate teacher competency development program requiring the design of a highly accessible smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners analyze real math class scenarios to identify and apply at least three self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies.
Explain situational strategy selection criteria with 80% accuracy when designing math lessons using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners maintain self-regulated learning journals and reflection activities using smartphone-based learning tools at least twice weekly.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
